marketing-text: Matattarar buɗe tushen bayanan COVID19. Dashboard mai tasowa tare da haɓakar mai bincike da cikakken bayanin REST API, an sanya shi cikin dukkan harsuna.
name: Suna
promo-message: An yi shi da ƙauna ❤️ daga ƙungiyar a Hoobu.com. Shirya shirin balaguro bayan cutar kanjamau yanzu tare da babban shirin tafiya mai dorewa na lokacinmu
general-advice-wash-hands-description: Wanke hannuwanka akai-akai kuma na tsawon 20 na amfani da sabulu da ruwa bayan ka hura hanci, tari ko hura kuma kafin ka ci ko ka kula da abinci. Wanke hannu na kwarai shine hanya mafi inganci na kashe ƙwayoyin cuta.
general-advice-minimise-contact-descript: Rage tarurruka marasa mahimmanci & balaguro da neman madadin gaisuwa kamar girgiza hannu, sumba ko sumbata.
general-advice-avoid-face-description: Hannu zai iya ɗaukar ƙwayoyin cuta cikin sauƙi kuma da zarar ya gurbata, hannaye zasu iya canja wurin kwayar cutar zuwa idanunku, hanci ko bakinku. Daga nan, kwayar cutar zata iya shiga jikin ku kuma ta sanya ku rashin lafiya.
general-advice-be-hygienic-description: Rufe bakinka da hanci tare da gwiwoyi mai yatsun ka ko kuma nama a yayin da kake tari ko hurawa, ka zubar da tsokar da aka yi amfani da ita nan take.
general-advice-self-isolate-title: Jin rashin lafiya? Ka ware kai!
general-advice-self-isolate-description: Idan ka kamu da cutar kamar alamu yakamata ka ware kanka a matsayin matakin yin riga-kafi kuma ka guji hadarin yada kamuwa da cuta ta hanyar zama a gida.
